instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Volumes keys not workin
threads.message:
Hi guys, 

Got Macbook air with liquid damage. After repair it everything is working fine except upper line keys ( volume, brightness etc) they are stucked at F1,F2,F3 functions not special keys). It's not software issue, tested customers ssd on my macbook air is ok, testing my ssd on customer macbook also not working. Already tried keyboard, trackpad, flexes and the only thing remains is the logic board. Even activating FN special keys in preferences it is continuing to work like F1, F2, etc. 


Any idea what it can be? The logic board seems to be ok visually. 


The damage was near backlight ic

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Volumes keys not workin
threads.message:
Keyboard is not directly connected to MLB.
Keyboard matrix is encoded into trackpad circuitry.
If the keys work, shouldn't be keyboard issue.
Did you try PRAM reset?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Volumes keys not workin
threads.message: Yes, PRAM, NVRAM, SMC Reset. Also trackpad and all flexes changed but same result.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Volumes keys not workin
threads.message:
Try new BIOS.
Clean ME should be on the forum already...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Volumes keys not workin
threads.message: ALso done. Same result. Is there any part of logic board that controls that line of the keys?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Volumes keys not workin
threads.message: Finally solved. It was deffective 3 trackpads. All were new, Extracted used from macook air and now it is working fine. Thanks

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Volumes keys not workin
threads.message:
The worst thing in this job, wasting time with "new" parts.
You can go crazy, thinking the problem is on other side...
